<Succed/Fail> Fnfm(<layout>,key$).description: Launches and runs the specified Screenio Screen. Returns True if the User Saved the Record, and False if they Cancelled.

<Key> Fnfm$(<layout>,key$).description: Launches and runs the specified Screenio Screen. Returns the Key$ or Record Number of the Saved Record, or an Empty String if the User Cancelled.
